attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...There are health/excercise clubs that are women only, there is the association of black police officers, there is the racial equality commision, or its new name, by these existing, it gives credence, and acknowledges non equal-nes, for instance, white police officers association? imagine the furory?
by the commission for racial equality existing, it means races aren't equal.
Until this divisive organisiation is ended, it will promote the lie that there is inequality, its time such fringe grudge agencies and commissions lived in the advanced enlightened world.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
